overview: Kadir and Doyok come to Jakarta looking for jobs. They run up against massive challenges due to their own lack of abilities. After they fail a magicians. They try becoming salesmen, then house painters, and then parking attendants. Finally,  Rosa (Baby Zelvia), Kadirâ€™s cousin, tries to help them, but, as usual, the whole thing comes to naught.
title: Pintar-pintaran
